Literature.Title: The chitin-binding capability of Cy-AMP1 from cycad is essential to antifungal activity.
Literature.Author: Yokoyama S, Iida Y, Kawasaki Y, Minami Y, Watanabe K, Yagi F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. cucumerium NBRC 6384(IC50=37µg/ml),Geotrichum candidum NBRC 4597(IC50=41µg/ml),Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis NBRC 12007(IC50=11µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans NBRC 13955(IC50=11µg/ml),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis NBRC 13763(IC50=5.9µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum MAFF 106567(IC50=9.0µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae NBRC 12935(IC50=2.0µg/ml)
